data: Most of the libraries on this page are C++ targeted for the Teensy 3.1 and above, though the intent is to keep them system independent. That being said, an atmel 328p doesn't have a lot of time or memory resources available, and while small implementations can be run on small systems, the benefit is sort of lost. The libraries shine best on 20MHz/16k ram systems and above.
Here's a few architectures that the libraries have been used on with success.
Libraries are build and maintained on github at github.com/marshalltaylorSFE. This page is a documentation extension of that work.
